name: Jetpack Astronaut (Matty B)
description:
Dou you like space? Jetpacks? Here is a short adventure, which can be completed in one sitting. Playtime around 45 minutes to an hour. The story is centered around an astronaut who is trying to meet up with his team and leave a forsaken moon, leave the mission behind. Players controlling the astronaut will face obstacles and various challenges along the way. A really simple and cute game, all you need is a keyboard. (mouse optional)

System requirements

Windows/Mac OS: Windows 7 or higher/ Mac OS High Sierra 10.13 or higher
Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia or AMD dedicated/integrated GPU with 512MB Memory
Storage: 500 MB available space
Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
